title: IT Manager (Based in Danang or Hanoi)
description:
Company Description
SmartDev is a leading provider of global software solutions. The company was established in 2014 and is a wholly owned subsidiary of Verysell Technologies Group (Switzerland).
Job Description
Job Summary:
We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated IT Manager to oversee and manage organization-wide systems and services globally. The IT Manager will be responsible (70%) for ensuring the efficient, secure, and seamless operation of all IT services and systems across the organization. This role requires strong technical expertise, leadership capabilities, and a strategic mindset to align IT initiatives with business goals.
In addition, the IT Manager will be responsible (30%) for Pre-sale in AMS Department to ensure high quality of proposal.
Key Responsibilities For IT Manager (70%)
Infrastructure Management
Oversee the design, deployment, and maintenance of IT infrastructure, including servers, networks, and storage systems.
Ensure optimal performance, scalability, and availability of IT infrastructure.
Manage disaster recovery and backup processes to ensure business continuity.
Application Management
Oversee the development, implementation, and maintenance of business-critical applications.
Collaborate with stakeholders to assess application requirements and recommend solutions.
Manage application updates, integrations, and lifecycle management.
IT Operations
Ensure smooth day-to-day IT operations, including helpdesk support and IT service delivery.
Monitor and optimize system performance to meet service level agreements (SLAs).
Develop and enforce IT policies, procedures, and best practices.
IT Security
Develop and implement a comprehensive IT security strategy to protect systems and data.
Develop and implement security policy and best practice guide for the organization
Oversee vulnerability assessments, penetration testing, and incident response plans.
Conduct regular system audit.
Ensure compliance with relevant regulations, standards, and policies (ISO 27001, SOC 2).
General Responsibilities
Lead and mentor a team of IT professionals, fostering a culture of collaboration and continuous improvement.
Develop and manage the IT budget, ensuring cost-effective delivery of IT services.
Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry trends to drive innovation.
Design training programs and workshops for staff
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align IT initiatives with organizational goals.
Prepare and present regular reports to the IT Director and senior management.
Key Responsibilities For Pre-Sale (30%)
Making high quality for proposal
Fluent English to communicate with Sales team and clients
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align AMS activities.
Qualifications
Minimum 5 years of experience in IT management or similar leadership roles.
Excellent communication in both English and Vietnamese and interpersonal skills to work effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Proven track record of managing IT infrastructure, applications, operations, and security in a complex environment.
Experience with IT governance frameworks such as ITIL, COBIT, or similar.
Have experiences as a System administrator (Linux/Windows) position
Have experience in network administration, LAN/WAN networking, load balancing, firewall device
Have experience in Office365 Global admin
Have experience of using and managing Jira/Confluence
Have experience of virtualization platforms (Xen, KVM, Vmware,..)
Have experience of web services like nginx, apache, proxy,‚Ä¶
Ability to write bash, powershell scripts
Have experience in Docker
Having ISO9000/SOC 2 experience is a plus
Nice to have
Certifications of CCNA, MCSA
Worked under ISO 27001 standard
ITIL 4 foundation certification
Preferred:
Willingness to work flexible hours when needed
Understanding of customer satisfaction principles and practices
Ability to work under pressure
Strong leadership and team management skills.
In-depth knowledge of IT infrastructure, cloud technologies, and application lifecycle management.
Expertise in cybersecurity frameworks, risk management, and compliance.
Excellent problem-solving, decision-making, and project management skills.
Additional Information
What We Offer
20 annual leave days alongside Vietnamese public holidays
Premium Health Care MIC
13th salary bonus/ competitive salary
Cutting-edge technologies/ Scrum methodology/ Agile development
Great activities (Team Building, Company Trip, Weekly Happy Friday, ‚Ä¶)
Work with high-profile multinational companies

title: Chief Information Officer, Insurtech (Vietnam-based)
description:
- Well-backed Insurtech Startup
- Ambitious Growth Trajectory
About the Firm
This is an exciting opportunity to be one of the founding members of an Insurtech startup, which is well-backed by a reputable name within the financial services industry, in Vietnam. The parent company is known to be a market leader in digital services and offerings, and will like to extend that product offering to Insurance.
Responsibilities
Reporting into the CEO of the Insurtech startup, you will be responsible for the technology roadmap across run and change pillars. Your span of responsibilities is wide, across data, digital, applications, infrastructure and cybersecurity. You can also leverage on the strong and expansive technologies of the parent company to build the digital platform for the Insurtech company. You will build a robust IT environment, fully leveraging on the newest technologies. Working along the business leaders, you will also design and deliver digital platforms, products and services to delight the customers.
Role Requirements
You are well-versed in the technology and regulatory landscape with Vietnam, with particular emphasis on the financial services sector. You are an experienced CIO, with fluency in budget management, organization setups, technology reviews, governance and stakeholder management. You are able to scale a team from 0 to 1 and possess strong leadership skills.
To apply
Please submit your resume to Patricia Teo at pt@kerryconsulting.com, quoting the job title. Due to high volume of applications, only shortlisted candidates are notified.

title: Business Analyst
location: Bac Tan Uyen, Binh Duong, Vietnam
description:
Job Description
Are you passionate about working for a company whose products bring happiness to millions of children and adults all over the globe.
Bring your business analyst skills and expertise to contribute to set the direction and plans for the Procurement and to seek for operational excellence with the internal customers and supply base at LEGO¬Æ Manufacturing Vietnam!
This role will be working at LEGO Manufacturing Vietnam in Binh Duong.
Play your part in our team succeeding
Be part of the local procurement team to support the LEGO investment and ensure that procurement get embedded into the new organization.
We emphasize building strong relations to our business partners and support them in achieving their priorities. The main focus is to stable supplier platform in full compliance with all LEGO requirements such as safety, quality, ethical manner and in the level competitive price.
LMV Procurement team is responsible for timely delivery of superior quality materials at the reasonable cost. You will ensure contracts Outline Agreements for packaging materials are raised in SAP, analyze data, create reports, and provide potential solutions.
This position exists in order to enable that LMV Procurement organization has the right reporting, processes and tools to ensure compliance to Processes, KPIs and strategies. Role is to analyze data, create reports, and provide potential solutions to your stakeholders. The role supports the understanding of capabilities needed to address business challenges. This position collaborate closely with Procurement Categories responsible buyers partnering with them in relation to process improvements and analytical insight locally and globally.
Core Responsibilities
Run, manage and improve key steps in the ordering process for BOM materials along with responsible buyers utilizing SAP, Power BI and other tools.
Calculation of batch sizes and assist procurement team in raising contracts Outline Agreements in SAP
Lead and/or participate in projects focused on automatization of tools, processes or visual management of the team.
